namely the western side of South America and the central part of Africa.

### sudamerica

[![GIVD](badges/sudamerica_givd.svg)](http://www.givd.info/ID/SA-CL-001)
[![version](badges/sudamerica_version.svg)](sudamerica.html)

This database was first launched as a vegetation-plot database for
Chilean grassland vegetation (**CL-Dataveg**; see also
[Alvarez et al. 2012](https://doi.org/10.7809/b-e.00230)). Currently it is
extended to other countries in South America and is opened for any plant
bio-diversity record and any vegetation type.

[Read more...](sudamerica.html)
